issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
Studio can't open Tiapp file. It will display an error. Logs:
{code}
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2015-07-27 14:59:06.356
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.NullPointerException)

	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.run(EclipseStarter.java:380)

	at com.appcelerator.titanium360.internal.core.Titanium360User.getStoredOrganizations(Titanium360User.java:222)

fields.summary: Studio can't edit Tiapp.xml in Tiapp Editor
fields.environment:
OSX 10.10.4
Using latest version of Appcelerator Studio
Using latest version of Java (1.8.0_51)
